charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, HAVING RESPONDED TO AN ASSIGNMENT INVOLVING AN ALLEGED ROBBERY WITH A FIREARM, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO MAKE APPROPRIATE OR REQUIRED ACTIVITY LOG ENTRIES.

WHILE ON-DUTY, HAVING RESPONDED TO AN ASSIGNMENT INVOLVING AN ALLEGED ROBBERY WITH A FIREARM, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO PROPERLY SUPERVISE HIS SUBORDINATES BY FAILING TO DIRECT THEM TO PREPARE A COMPLAINT REPORT
WHILE ON-DUTY, HAVING RESPONDED TO AN ASSIGNMENT INVOLVING AN ALLEGED ROBBERY WITH A FIREARM, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO NOTIFY  THE DETECTIVE SQUAD FOR FURTHER INVESTIGATION
ABUSED HIS AUTHORITY AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT, IN THAT HE STOPPED A PERSON UNKNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY.
WRONGFULLY USED FORCE, IN THAT HE USED A CONDUCTED ELECTRICAL WEAPON AGAINST A PERSON UNKNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT  POLICE NECESSITY.
WRONGFULLY USED FORCE, IN THAT HE USED PHYSICAL FORCE, NAMELY PUSHED A PERSON UNKNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT POLICE NECCESSITY.
ENGAGED IN A PHYSICAL ALTERCATION WITH A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (33 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, FRISKED A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT, WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY
WHILE ON-DUTY, WAS DISCOURTEOUS TO A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT
FAILED TO RESIDE WITHIN THE CITY OF NEW YORK OR COUNTIES OF WESTCHESTER, ROCKLAND, ORANGE, PUTNAM, NASSAU OR SUFFOLK AS REQUIRED.
FAILED TO SUBMIT CHANGE OF NAME, RESIDENCE OR SOCIAL CONDITION FORM TO DEPARTMENT.
HAVING CHANGED SAID MEMBER'S RESIDENCE, FAILED TO MAINTAIN CORRECT DEPARTMENT OF MOTOR VEHICLE RECORDS .
WHILE ON SICK REPORT WRONGFULLY LEFT CONFINES OF THE CITY OR RESIDENCE COUNTIES WITHOUT APPROVAL FROM CHIEF OF PERSONNEL.
WRONGFULLY REPORTED A NEW YORK ADDRESS TO THE DEPARTMENT WHEN IN FACT SAID MEMBER RESIDED IN NEW JERSEY.

allegations.penalty: C - COMMAND DISCIPLINE, VACATION DAYS (8 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, POLICE OFFICER DID WRONGFULLY MAKE COMMUNICATIONS TO A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT, IN A MANNER LIKELY TO CAUSE ANNOYANCE OR ALARM.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, DID WRONGFULLY ATTEMPT TO PREVENT A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT FROM FILING A COMPLAINT AGAINST HER WITH THE NYPD.
WHILE ON-DUTY, SAID OFFICER WAS GIVEN A DIRECTIVE BY A SERGEANT, TO TAKE DOWN INFORMATION FROM A CALLER MAKING A CIVILIAN COMPLAINT, AND SAID OFFICER FAILED TO COMPLY WITH SAID DIRECTIVE.
WHILE ON-DUTY, WAS DISCOURTEOUS TO A SERGEANT.
PURCHASED ITEMS USING A DECEASED RELATIVE'S BENEFIT CARD WITHOUT AUTHORITY.
